author: jochembrouwer
content: Not sure here but I might have triggered a nasty bug on testnet where we don't have a spec for (there were attempts to create a consistent spec but in the end it was decided that this was close to impossible). It would be great if you can preseed the precompile accounts with 1 wei upon genesis, this will not trigger this gray area of this bug. (Just fill the accounts 0x00..0000 to 0x00..00ff with 1 wei)
